title: Explaining the Evil Eye to Sam Harris
description:
Many New Atheist types use the example of the evil eye to typify superstitious ideas and social behaviour that is irrational.  I try to explain the manner in which something like the evil eye can make sense to a modern person. 

My links:  
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
